languages.text: "А мы... а как же мы... А можно с вами, Ваша Светлость? Не бросайте нас, умоляю!"
"And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"
languages.original_text: "А мы... а как же мы... А можно с вами, Ваша Светлость? Не бросайте нас, умоляю!"

traits.locale_text: "And us — what about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Don't leave us behind! Please!"
"And us — what about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Don't leave us behind! Please!"
"And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"
"And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"
"And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"
"And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"

languages.text: "Und wir? Was ist mit uns? Können wir mit Euch kommen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft? Bitte lasst uns nicht zurück!"
languages.original_text: "And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"

traits.locale_text: "Und wir? Was ist mit uns? Können wir mit Euch kommen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft? Bitte lasst uns nicht zurück!"

languages.text: « Et nous ? Qu'allons-nous devenir ? On peut venir avec vous, Votre Seigneurie ? Par pitié, ne nous abandonnez pas ! »
languages.original_text: "And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"

traits.locale_text: « Et nous ? Qu'allons-nous devenir ? On peut venir avec vous, Votre Seigneurie ? Par pitié, ne nous abandonnez pas ! »

languages.text: “那我们呢？我们怎么办？我们能和您一起走吗，大人？求求您，不要抛弃我们！”
languages.original_text: "And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"

traits.locale_text: “那我们呢？我们怎么办？我们能和您一起走吗，大人？求求您，不要抛弃我们！”

languages.text: 「それで、私たちは？私たちはどうなるのですか？私たちも一緒に行っていいですか、{mf|陛下|陛下}？お願いです、私たちを置いて行かないでください！」
languages.original_text: "And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"

traits.locale_text: 「それで、私たちは？私たちはどうなるのですか？私たちも一緒に行っていいですか、{mf|陛下|陛下}？お願いです、私たちを置いて行かないでください！」

languages.text: «¿Y nosotros? ¿Qué hay de nosotros? «¿Podemos ir con usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». Por favor, no nos deje atrás».
languages.original_text: "And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y nosotros? ¿Qué hay de nosotros? «¿Podemos ir con usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». Por favor, no nos deje atrás».

languages.text: "Peki biz? Bize ne olacak? Sizinle gelebilir miyiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Bizi geride bırakmayın, n'olur!"
languages.original_text: "And us? What about us? Can we go with you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Please, don't leave us behind!"

traits.locale_text: "Peki biz? Bize ne olacak? Sizinle gelebilir miyiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Yalvarırız bizi böyle terk etmeyin!"
